name: Fresh Touch Media
tag_list: bass-drop, dubstep, app, developer, designer, engineer, music, iphone, ipad, ios
overview:
Fresh Touch Media is an app development, graphic and sound design team founded in 2011. Our aim is to create innovative and fun apps bringing life and creativity to music production and video games.

June 2012 was a landmark month for the company who reached the top of the apple app store in Australia with their release of Bass Drop, a revolutionary ultra compact dubstep studio with keyboard, sampler, pitch bending and loop system.
